contentrichtext.text: {{Contains Chinese text}} {{Refimprove|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox ethnic group |group= Sán Dìu people<br /><small>{{linktext|山|由|族}}</small><br /><small>Người Sán Dìu ({{linktext|𠊛|山|由}})</small> |image= |caption= |poptime=146,821<ref name="TK"/> |popplace= Northern [[Vietnam]] |rels=Predominantly [[Mahayana Buddhism]]<br> [[Taoism]], [[Catholicism]] and [[Evangelicalism]] |langs=[[Cantonese language|Cantonese]], [[Vietnamese language|Vietnamese]] |related=[[Cantonese people]] }} The '''Sán Dìu''' (also known as '''San Deo''', '''Trai''', '''Trai Dat''' and '''Man Quan Coc'''; {{zh|t=山由族|cy=''Sanyau Juk''|p=''Shān yóu zú''}}; [[Chữ Nôm]]: {{linktext|𠊛|山|由}}; [[Quốc Ngữ]]: Người Sán Dìu) is an [[ethnic group]] in northern [[Vietnam]]. They are believed to have migrated from [[Guangdong]] around 1600 CE. The group's estimated population as of 2000 was 117,500; a 2009 estimate put the number at 146,821.<ref name="TK">[http://www.gso.gov.vn/default.aspx?tabid=512&idmid=5&ItemID=10798 Tổng điều tra dân số và nhà ở Việt Nam năm 2009: Kết quả toàn bộ.] Hà Nội, 6-2010. page 134-225.</ref> They speak an archaic variant of [[Cantonese language|Cantonese]], and it is suggested that some still speak [[Iu Mien language|Iu Mien]].{{Citation needed|date=August 2011}} The major religions are [[Mahayana Buddhism]] and [[Taoism]], with elements of [[animism]] and [[ancestor-worship]]. About 400 are [[Roman Catholic]]s; a few are [[Evangelicalism|evangelical]] [[Protestantism|Protestant]]s. This ethnic group is mainly concentrated in [[Quang Ninh]] province. In the Chinese script, Sán Dìu is written as "山瑶", meaning the Yao in the Mountains. The Yao are an ethnic group living in southern China. ==See also== * [[List of ethnic groups in Vietnam]] * [[Hoa]] * [[Ngái]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.joshuaproject.net/peopctry.php?rop3=108601&rog3=VM San Diu of Vietnam] *[http://www.vnpeoples.org/Sandiu/ San Diu People] {{Ethnic groups in Vietnam}} {{DEFAULTSORT:San Diu People}} [[Category:Ethnic groups in Vietnam]] [[Category:Guangdong]] {{Asia-ethno-group-stub}}
